body.name: Nictemaw Portable Washing Machine 17.8Lbs Large Capacity 2.4 Cu.ft Portable Washer Machine with 10 Programs and 8 Water Levels Selections Mini Washing Machine for Apartment, Home, Dorms, Rv
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
features: Powerful Motor - Portable washer machine features a high-performance motor, ensuring strong washing power and efficiently removing up to 90% of water during the spin-drying process. Whether tackling stubborn stains or handling large loads of laundry, the motor's consistent output ensures outstanding washing results and thorough moisture removal

Multi-Function - Small washer machine offers 10 washing modes, catering to various needs from gentle to intensive wash cycles. It comes equipped with a 24-hour delay function, tub-clean and child lock feature, providing ample flexibility for selecting the optimal wash setting based on fabric type and stain level

Compact yet Spacious - 17.8LBS capacity honeycomb inner can wash your clothes in one go. 32.7x18.9x18.9, mini washing machine boasts a compact and lightweight design, easily fitting into any corner of your home, you can effortlessly move it between rooms, making it a perfect solution for limited spaces

Built-in Drain Pump - Clothes washing machine utilizes a built-in drain pump technology, providing robust drainage power. After each wash cycle, the pump automatically expels water. Worries about draining are a thing of the past

Energy-efficient and Quiet - Portable washing machine equipped with a high-quality motor that delivers stable power output. Compared to similar models, this washing machine saves up to 84% in energy consumption, leading to significant cost savings for your household. Its powerful sound insulation design guarantees minimal noise during operation, creating a tranquil washing environment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little machine
reviews.reviewText: Best little washing machine. You can control any aspect of the wash to customize the cycle you want. I’m a 60 year old woman and I carried the machine by myself up 2 flights of stairs to get to my apartment. The spin dry cycle really takes the water out of your clothes so they dry super fast.Irt dies my engineer’s heart good to see such a tough little machine that works so well. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tough little machine
reviews.reviewText: This little machine is amazing! Strong motor! Spuns the clothes very dry. Come out clean. Takes more laundry than i expected. Not for blankets. I place in two jeans three tees. Thermal long sleeves and a dew small towels. Handkes it no problem. I use it every day for about a month with no issues so far. It has 10 settings including speed wash, soak etc just like a regular washer. I love it. It is perfect for me. I wouldn’t recommend for families doung alot of laundry daily but for a single person or a couple who dont need a big washer its great. Takes up no space. Easy to hook up and i carried it down to the basement myself. I think out of the box and only weighs about 40 something pounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact washer with full-size cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Great small washer, that works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best washer ever. This thing is a machine! Cleans my clothing great. I could easily fit 2 bulky sweat pants, 2 shirts, and all my underwear. It cleaned it amazingly in 30 minutes.I honestly really didn’t want a mini washer at first because I wanted a big washer, but I couldn’t get any place to deliver one to my rural location. But this thing is awesome and works just as good. It fits way more clothing than I expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality , big enough to wash king size quilt cover.
reviews.reviewText: I just bought it one month, model # NIC- 5573-1103. It is good size for small space . IT is big enough to wash king size quilt cover. It is not been with wheels. The engine sound is okay. Detergent level is 1-2L, when manual watering reaches 2/3 full. But detergent level default settings is 6 and it is easy to jump back to 6 , so you need check the detergent level when you push start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this washing machine!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this for the upstairs living area. I didn't have alot of room for a standard large washer like i have downstairs. I needed something small enough to fit in a little nook of a hall thats only 20inches wide. This washer is better than the one downstairs!! It actually cleans my laundry!! I couldn't believe the dirty nasty water draining out when I washed my work clothes the first time, I honestly don't think the washer downstairs has ever cleaned my clothes!!You have options: You can choose your Liters amount. 4L all the way to 8L. I go with 5L or 6L on a normal laundry day. It has settings with several washing cycles to chose from no matter your choice you can change the Liter amount on all of them.It can fit quiet a bit. More than I expected. I don't like to overload it i like knowing my laundry has room to swish around to get clean.For instance a King Size bottom and top sheet will fit and wash nicely on 7L. I preferred them separately on 4L, I sleep with 2 60lb pups who don't exactly shower every day LOL.The drain hose is a good length. They give you specifics on purchasing longer if needed.They however don't give specifics on if you need a longer intake water hose, I do wish the water intake hose was a foot or two longer and it would be nice to have a shut off button on it as well to stop it from leaking water when detached.For me, i dont move the washer to another area, it stays in the nook. So Its either let it hang down to the floor with a towel to catch the water draining out or as I've found is less messy is to just put the hose in the drum to drain.It was difficult to find a faucet to attach it too as I have all upgraded faucets and the attachments wouldn't fit. After some trial and error I ended up getting a split connector for my shower head and attaching a second long shower hose that stays connected in the shower permanently; with the quick connect attachment the washer comes with its easy to plug up and unplug when I'm not using it.It is light weight if you need to move it from room to room. I'm pretty handy so a trip to menards and some creative building techniques of my own I built a stand for it so my small dryer could be mounted above it.OVERALL: I love this washer and i love the fact i can choose the amount of water i want for each load!If you have a small space it just want your own washer and if you want a washer to actually clean your clothes with complete convenience and privacy, BUY THIS! You won't regret it.The video is disgusting, but this is what getting dirt out of your laundry looks like! Full disclosure it was a rainy day and my pups decided to roll around on my bed to dry off after playing in the yard for an hour and this was the result of that!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to operate highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: This came with everything needed to connect and start using. It was nicely packaged. We are going to use in our motorhome. We ordered a small dolly cart to use to move around. It is true to size. We are excited to begin using the machine. Everything is exactly as was described. We picked up an extended warranty just in case. So far it’s great! Would recommend and their shipping was quick! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little washing machine. It does well for me for about an outfit of clothes, though I did use it successfully in washing a mattress cover. It takes about 15 gallons of water on the “common” cycle, so, if, like me, you don’t have it hooked up to a water supply, you’ll have to carry five gallons of water to it to wash and rinse. I use five gallon aquarium jugs for this, and they do get pretty heavy. I haven’t tried the other cycles, but seeing how dirty the rinse water is when it comes out, it looks as if the machine is doing a pretty good job. Very easy to load; I’ve not had it go off balance on me yet. Clothes come out dry enough you can’t wring any water out of them, and, depending on weight, have been taking 3-10 hours to dry on the rack. My only suggestion would be to make the product manual a bit more comprehensive. I’d like to know what all the different cycles do, how many times they rinse, and how much water you can expect to use. The booklet provided leaves a bit to speculation. Overall I would recommend this machine if you are in a small space like I am and want to avoid trips to the laundromat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Cheap easy solution to tidy your office.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to organise my home office setup, they are great for cables as they do not ‘pinch’ and damage cables like plastic cable ties do. They are also very easy to add cables to a bundle. I have also chained them together to go around larger structures as-well which is really useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent, definitely worth having at home!
reviews.reviewText: These are brilliant. Simple product but great quality and superb value. Multiple uses and I like the more modern type of hook/loop fastening that is very low profile compared to typical Velcro type systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 22, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something to tidy up the nest of wires behind my desk and the spares which tangle themselves up in the drawer. These did both quite nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Delivered on time and as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: does as it says on description
reviews.reviewText: absolutely love these cables so easy to use ,can undo them and reuse them, I bought them to tidy cables at back of tv, perferct look much neater, definitely buy again
